summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD F-350. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO ELDER FORD OF ROMEO LOCATED AT 633000 VAN DYKE, WASHINGTON, MI 48095, (586)838-1250, ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS IN THE PAST FOUR MONTHS IN REGARD TO AN ELECTRICAL SYSTEM FAILURE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE BCM (BODY CONTROL MODULE) WAS REPLACED ON THREE OCCASIONS HOWEVER, THE FAILURE PERSISTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND INFORMED OF THE FAILURE HOWEVER, NO FURTHER ASSISTANCE WAS PROVIDED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 87,000
